Eyes of the Basilisk [Attack Technique].name: Eyes of the Basilisk [Attack Technique]
Eyes of the Basilisk [Attack Technique].flavor: You drive your enemy back, then bind it in place with a gaze.
Eyes of the Basilisk [Attack Technique].onHit: 2d12 + Dexterity modifier damage, and you push the target 3 squares. The target is then marked and immobilized until the end of your next turn. If the target is already slowed or immobilized, it is restrained until the end of your next turn.
Eyes of the Basilisk [Attack Technique].effect: You move your speed + 2, ignoring difficult terrain. Any enemy that misses you with an opportunity attack provoked by this movement is slowed until the end of your next turn.

Stone-Shatter Strike.name: Stone-Shatter Strike
Stone-Shatter Strike.flavor: Your attack freezes a foe, rendering it vulnerable to your follow-up strike and threatening to transform it to living stone.
Stone-Shatter Strike.onHit: 2d8 + Dexterity modifier psychic damage, and the target is immobilized (save ends).
Stone-Shatter Strike.firstFailedSavingThrow: The target is instead petrified (save ends). The target takes a -2 penalty to saving throws against this effect.
Stone-Shatter Strike.onMiss: Half damage, and the target is immobilized until the end of your next turn.
Stone-Shatter Strike.effect: Once during the encounter while the target is immobilized or petrified by this power, you can use the Stone-Shatter Attack power against the target.
Stone-Shatter Strike.requirement: The power Stone-Shatter Strike must be active in order to use this power.
Stone-Shatter Strike.secondaryOnHit: 3d8 + Dexterity modifier damage, and the target falls prone and cannot stand up (save ends). If the target is petrified, this attack ignores the resistance granted by that condition and deals 4d8 extra damage.
Stone-Shatter Strike.special: When charging, you can use this power in place of a melee basic attack.

Basilisk Nature Defense.name: Basilisk Nature Defense
Basilisk Nature Defense.flavor: The power of your mind transforms your body into stone.
Basilisk Nature Defense.trigger: An attack makes you unconscious or stuns you
Basilisk Nature Defense.effect: You are instead petrified for as long as you would be unconscious or stunned by the triggering attack. You gain a +2 power bonus to saving throws until you are no longer petrified. When the petrification ends, you can spend a healing surge.
